public method WeBWorK::Form::TiedParam::FETCH (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in FETCH: 6
sub FETCH {
    my $self = shift;
    my $f = $self->{f};
    my $param = $self->{param};
    return $f->param($param);
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::TiedParam::STORE (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in STORE: 7
sub STORE {
    my $self = shift;
    my @values = @_;
    my $f = $self->{f};
    my $param = $self->{param};
    $f->param($param, @values);
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::TiedParam::TIESCALAR ( $$$   ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in TIESCALAR($$$): 10
sub TIESCALAR ($$$) {
    my ($invocant, $f, $param) = @_;
    my $class = ref($invocant) || $invocant;
    my $self = {
        f => $f,
        param => $param,
    };
    
    return bless $self, $class;
}
